PM.recommendation: Avoid clopidogrel. Patient is a Poor Metabolizer of CYP2C19 — drug cannot be activated. Consider prasugrel or ticagrelor as alternatives.

IM.recommendation: Consider alternative antiplatelet therapy. Intermediate Metabolizer status reduces clopidogrel efficacy.

NM.recommendation: Standard clopidogrel dosing is appropriate for this Normal Metabolizer.

RM.recommendation: Standard dosing. Rapid Metabolizer — monitor for potential over-activation.

URM.recommendation: Ultra-rapid Metabolizer. Slightly elevated activation — monitor platelet response.

PM.recommendation: Avoid codeine. Poor Metabolizer of CYP2D6 — codeine cannot be converted to morphine. Use non-opioid analgesics.

IM.recommendation: Use lower codeine dose with caution. Intermediate Metabolizer may have reduced analgesic effect.

NM.recommendation: Standard codeine dosing is appropriate for Normal Metabolizers.

RM.recommendation: Use with caution. Rapid Metabolizer may convert codeine to morphine faster — risk of adverse effects.

URM.recommendation: CONTRAINDICATED. Ultra-rapid Metabolizer — dangerous morphine over-production. Do not use codeine.

PM.recommendation: CONTRAINDICATED. Poor Metabolizer of DPYD — severe risk of fluorouracil toxicity. Use alternative chemotherapy or drastically reduce dose under specialist supervision.

IM.recommendation: Reduce fluorouracil dose by 50%. Intermediate DPYD Metabolizer has increased toxicity risk. Monitor closely.

PM.recommendation: Significantly reduce warfarin dose. CYP2C9 Poor Metabolizer — very slow drug metabolism, high bleeding risk. Use INR monitoring.

IM.recommendation: Reduce warfarin starting dose by 25-50%. Intermediate Metabolizer — increased drug exposure and bleeding risk.

NM.recommendation: Standard warfarin dosing with routine INR monitoring.

PM.recommendation: CONTRAINDICATED. SLCO1B1 Poor Metabolizer — extremely high simvastatin plasma levels, risk of severe myopathy. Switch to pravastatin or rosuvastatin.

IM.recommendation: Use lower simvastatin dose (max 20mg/day). Intermediate SLCO1B1 function increases myopathy risk. Monitor CK levels.

PM.recommendation: CONTRAINDICATED. TPMT Poor Metabolizer — risk of life-threatening myelosuppression. Consider alternative immunosuppressant.

IM.recommendation: Reduce azathioprine dose by 30-70%. Intermediate TPMT activity — elevated toxicity risk. Monitor blood counts frequently.
